The Evolution of Final Fantasy XIII: Three Systems, One Plot

21 Mar 2015

After watching the E3 trailer for Final Fantasy XIII, my first response was “Okay, I’m buying a PS3… when I have the money”. Flash forward 9 years: Final Fantasy XIII and it’s sequels came out to lukewarm reviews, and made everyone question what it meant to be “Final Fantasy”.

Visual Novels: The w's of visual novels as a medium?

21 Mar 2015

There’s an interesting dynamic in entertainment. People have their preferred forms of consuming it: books and poetry long ago, television and film relatively recently, and exeedingly recently, Youtube clips and Video games. The medium will differ, but what is gained usually does not.
